data.text: @MarieanneM3 @lakitukl @MarcTennant That's why I don't eat greens
@TheRealPembo @lakitukl @MarcTennant Do you not understand most wet markets do ‘not’ sell you a live, exotic animal alongside your fresh greens🙄
@DavidJoffe64 @MarcTennant The truth is the first casualty of war and viral epidemics!
@t15871631 @MarcTennant @rothwell_scott So you have peer reviewed evidence there t
@MarcTennant @rothwell_scott If you believe it originated from a wet market I have a bridge to sell.
@DavidJoffe64 Oh its a terrific two papers - from a global team.  I can get the GIS one but the details of the genetics paper is above me...  They are good.

@MarcTennant Where else would you find a civet with a bat, a human and a pangolin!!!

Thank you providing this information. It's now so many generations and mutations later, regardless, the origins are essential of we are to prevent more grief 🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🏆 https://t.co/l7EMSZ9Seo

@MarcTennant 👍🏻👍🏻

Will do!!!
Thanks for sharing!! 🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻
I'm sure this was ever going to be explained in any other way...

Great paper @MarcTennant 🏆💪🏻🏆
